paper_title.en: Tomographic data collection of sonic field using laser diffraction(共著)

paper_title.ja: Ultrasonic Imaging Reconstructed from the Inclination Angle of a Smooth Surface.
paper_title.en: Ultrasonic image reconstruction from the inclination angle of a smooth(共著)

description.ja: We propose a method for acoustical imaging, reconstructed from the inclination angle of a smooth surface. The detected inclination image is a differential image of the original geometry. The sensing unit consists of an ultrasonic transmitter and two ultrasonic receivers. Three transducers are kept facing an object. The inclination angle of the object surface depends on the phase difference between the two detected signals. Finally, the geometry of the object is reconstructed from the integration of the measured inclination image. Good experimental results were obtained in the reconstruction of a slightly ablated aluminum plate with an area of approximately 95×145 mm<SUP>2</SUP>, and a concave mirror with an area of approximately 115×115 mm<SUP>2</SUP>, at the frequency of 2.0 MHz. The spatial resolution corresponded to a transducer interval. This method has the advantage in that it can be used for industrial measurements and for medical diagnostics.
description.en: We propose a method for acoustical imaging, reconstructed from the inclination angle of a smooth surface. The detected inclination image is a differential image of the original geometry. The sensing unit consists of an ultrasonic transmitter and two ultrasonic receivers. Three transducers are kept facing an object. The inclination angle of the object surface depends on the phase difference between the two detected signals. Finally, the geometry of the object is reconstructed from the integration of the measured inclination image. Good experimental results were obtained in the reconstruction of a slightly ablated aluminum plate with an area of approximately 95×145 mm<SUP>2</SUP>, and a concave mirror with an area of approximately 115×115 mm<SUP>2</SUP>, at the frequency of 2.0 MHz. The spatial resolution corresponded to a transducer interval. This method has the advantage in that it can be used for industrial measurements and for medical diagnostics.

paper_title.ja: 音響波プローブを用いる空間温度モニタリング(共著)
近距離音場ホログラフィ(単著)

paper_title.en: Amplitude-phase-modulation (APM) using a shear horizontal (SH) plate-mode wave device

description.en: A method of realizing an amplitude-phase modulation using a travelling type ultrasonic device is described. A shear horizontal (SH) plate-mode wave device is composed of four interdigital transducers (IDTs). The first and the forth IDTs are used for the carrier signal input, and device output. The another two IDTs located at the central part of the SH-wave device are used as an attenuator and a phase-shifter for amplitude and phase modulation, respectively. The operation principle that is analyzed with the equivalent circuit model for the amplitude-phase modulator, is given with experimental confirmation. At the frequency of 1.20 MHz, the device performs as amplitude modulator and phase modulator, simultaneously.

publication_name.en: Journal of the Acoustical Society of Japan (E) (English translation of Nippon Onkyo Gakkaishi)

paper_title.en: Spacing of transducer-elements in transmitter and receiver arrays to collect data for ultrasonic diffraction tomography

description.en: We discuss the spacing of the transducer elements of transmitter and receiver arrays to sample sufficient data for ultrasonic diffraction tomography. We intend to save fairly the data acquisition time of our prior method by replacing the mechanical scanning of the pair of a transmitter and a receiver with the electrical switching of the both arrays. One of the most important parameters of the arrays is the spacing of the elements. In the previous paper we used the equation of the spacing derived from the theory of acoustical holography for convenience, though the prerequisites might not fit for the case. We now newly obtain the equation by calculating the phase of the received signal. New result proves 3 times narrower than the previous one. We confirm the feasibility of the new result by the numerical calculation and the experiment.

paper_title.ja: 超音波送波器・受波器対向走査型回折トモグラフィの映像再構成(共著)
paper_title.en: Image reconstructions of the ultrasonic diffraction tomography with data obtained by a pair of compound-scanned transmitter and receiver

description.ja: 超音波の回折や散乱の効果を除去して鮮明な断層映像を得る試みは超音波回折トモグラフィとして研究されている。従来の回折トモグラフィの方式は均質な平面波で物体を照射する必要があるなど実験的な困難さを有していた。これに対し、我々が提案する方式は市販のトランスジューサを用いて容易に実現できる利点を有する。本論文では、基本的な理論を示し、それに基づく三つの再構成法、すなわち、フーリエ領域内挿法(内挿法)、フーリエ領域非内挿法(非内挿法)、重畳法を述べる。そして、シミュレーションと実験により、各再構成法の映像を比較、検討する。その結果、現時点では非内挿法が最も適当であり、良好な再構成映像が得られることが分かった。
